recipe.title: Passion-Fruit Nieve
ingredients: 3 cups passion-fruit nectar (24 fl oz), chilled
instructions: Stir together all ingredients and freeze in ice cream maker. Transfer sorbet to an airtight container and put in freezer to harden, at least 1 hour.
